external_games.name: Bouken Yuuki Pluster World: Densetsu no Pluster Gate EX

name: Bouken Yuuki Pluster World: Densetsu no Pluster Gate EX
summary: Bouken Yuuki Pluster World: Densetsu no Pluster Gate EX is a Role-Playing game, developed by Will and published by Takara, which was released in Japan in 2003.
